Type.Name: IXPathNavigable
Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Thread safety depends on the implementation.

Docs.summary: Represents an interface to provide XPathNavigator instance.
Docs.remarks: This interface provides the way to create XPathNavigator instance. Two XPathNavigable implementation are available in System.XML.dll: XPathDocument and XmlDocument. See for the detailed differences of those implementations.

Docs.summary: Creates an instance of the provided by the implemantation of this interface.
Docs.returns: The instance created by the implementation of this interface.
